title: PROJECT: Yi attack sound and double strike animation must be redone.
body:
So im long time Yi main and when i switched to PROJECT skin i couldnt find myself comfortable playing it cause its so different from classic and all other skins. Two main problems are that attack sound is not loud and "accurate enough" so its difficult to tell when the attack actually hits so you can cancel its animation. Second issue is that double strike animation looks more like a single attack so it makes hard to track double strike stacks without actually looking at buff bar. 

Please reconsider making those changes until skin is "fresh".

replies.body:
Hey PiVoRx,

There is actually a bug with Double Strike where the second hit isn't making a sound. This should be fixed next patch. ^-^

But double strike looks like a single attack anyway, is this intended? 
And how about basic attack sounds? It's really hard to tell when you can cancel animation after it hits.

It's a swipe left then swipe swipe right animation for Double Strike, but the second part of that animation doesn't have a sound at the moment.

Not sure about the basic attacks, but I can take a look.
